concept.title: N1QL in Couchbase
concept.shortdesc: N1QL provides a SQL like query language for Couchbase. Unlike views, N1QL does not require a dedicated index. You can use N1QL to issue ad hoc queries on data.

conbody.p: If you are using N1QL in your application and querying data using a variety of different attributes, you need fast query lookups and scans at a high throughput. Indexes boost N1QL query look ups and scans. These indexes have different architectures which are based on view indexes, or global secondary indexes (GSI).
